title: Succulent Chicken with Apricot Sauce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 (1.35kg) whole chicken, cut into pieces', 'salt and pepper or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon dried marjoram', '4 tablespoons white wine', '4 tablespoons chicken stock', 'SAUCE', '4 tablespoons apricot jam', '2 tablespoons malt vinegar', '1 1/2 teaspoons finely chopped root ginger', '2 tablespoons honey']
